structure.unit: ARTICLE I. - PEDESTRIANS' RIGHTS AND DUTIES

law.text: It shall be unlawful for any person to cross a street, on foot or by any other means, at a point and in a manner prohibited by this section and where a sign, barricade or other notice indicates that such crossing is prohibited. Locations where pedestrian crossing is so prohibited shall be as designated in Traffic Schedule No. 12, "Pedestrian Crossing Prohibited."
